data.title: What QUALCOMM (QCOM)'s Data Center and AI Updates Mean for Shareholders
data.description: In recent days, Qualcomm has drawn attention due to renewed optimism in its diversified revenue streams, including strong non-Apple handset growth, guidance for low teens percentage growth in early FY2026, and updates on its data center strategy following the Alphawave acquisition. This has led to discussions that the market may have underestimated the company's potential in smart devices, automotive, data center, and AI-focused chip shipments. An interesting insight is that management's...
data.keywords: Qualcomm, data center, revenue streams, percentage growth, chip development
